text_block_list.text:
Summer training starts this week, King was 
working hard at the beach but…

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Trainer, we've done enough beach training.
choice_data_list: What's this all of a sudden?
What's up all of a sudden?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Ufufu… ♪ 
Let's see, I'll let you in on it too trainer.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I heard of a secret training plan! A training plan 
taken on by many G1 horse girls, a first-class training plan!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Behind the forest on the training grounds, there's a super 
advanced course! You didn't know either, did you?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Ohhohoho! Of course. 
After all, I only recently heard about it on the net!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Well, it said "beginners will be in for a rude awakening". 
But there's no way I'd fail!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
You have nothing to worry about. 
Just leave everything to me!
Is what King Halo told me-

text_block_list.name: Bob-cut Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Eh～!? King, are you really gonna run in the forest tomorrow～!?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Yes, what of it?

text_block_list.name: Cat-eyed Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
B-But is this course safe? 
I heard the course itself is pretty fishy…

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Fufu, it's fine! King is a first-class horse girl! 
No matter what course, I'll run at full power!
…For now, let's just prepare for tomorrow.
―The next day.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Ohhohoho! So you came trainer. Today I'll 
give you the right to observe King's perfect training course!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: My preparations are perfect.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Last night, I checked all the rumored super advanced 
courses! The mark on my phone map is perfect!
choice_data_list: It it okay to not bring a backup map?
Are we okay without a backup map?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Don't need it. We're in the digital age. You've got 
to leave everything to your phone and live smartly.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
In comparison, you've still got a long way to go. 
Where do you intend to go with that equipment?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Well. if you're not going to be extra luggage. I don't mind. 
Now, be sure to keep up with me!
And so King's mountain training begun, but-

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Hmm… it really is hard to run on mountain trails. 
There's too many natural obstacles and bumps.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Plus the road isn't paved at all, and it's super humid… 
How many times does this make… my phone…

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Te, UWAGH!? B-B-BUGS!?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: TR-TR-TRAINER, DO SOMETHING ABOUT THIS～!!!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Ha… Ha… Ha…

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I-I'm fine. I'm not the kind of King to fall down over something 
like this… Now, onto our next destination…

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …Huh?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Hey, trainer. Have you seen my phone around?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
O-of course not! I was just asking! 
As if a first-class horse girl would lose her phone…

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …Remember, remember… me… ah!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Yes, that's it. Trainer! 
We passed by the spot with the bugs right!? Let's go back there!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Um, it was at the 2nd resting point. It's okay, it's okay. 
I already marked it on my phone map…

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …Wait, my phone!!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
O-of course I'm okay… 
Th-there's no way I'd give up over something like this…

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I'm going to PROPERLY find my phone, PROPERLY get 
out of this forest, and return to the training camp…

…At this rate she, ll end up in distress. I memorize the routes 
we've been through, while looking at my map-

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Geez, what are you doing at a time like this…

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Wait, isn't that a map! You've even got a compass! And this red 
line… is this the path we've been running till now?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: You've done it, trainer! If we have this we can even find my ph-

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Urgh… I-I'm, counting on you.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Looks like we came back safe somehow…

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Yes, no problems at all. 
As you can see my phone is fine too…

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
That said… you were rather prepared. 
Even though I spurred this onto you only yesterday.
choice_data_list: Well, I am aiming to be a first-class trainer after all.
Well, I am aiming to be a first-class trainer after all.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
…Hmph, cheeky… but, yes. I admit it… 
this was my fault, I didn't prepare properly.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
If you hadn't prepared the map and compass, 
I think this would have turned out much worse.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: So… sorry, for causing you trouble.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …Hmph.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Just for today, I'll praise you. Respecting a first-class horse 
girl like this is first-class treatment.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Then, let's reflect on this for now. 
Tomorrow we're going to perfect that forest training!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Of course!! I'm the first. class horse girl King Halo. Things 
like "give up" and "impossible" don't exist in my dictionary!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Let's hurry and return to the training grounds! If you're a 
first. class trainer you won't keep me waiting, right?

And so, being dragged along by King Halo, it was 
decided we'd both reflect on what happened today.
